page.title: 14QUARRYING ON MENDIP BENEFITS
page.content: The{Batts Combe Quarry}owned by A.R.C, is the biggest single industry in Cheddar and employs many of the Cheddar menfolk. In comparison with the quarries between{Shepton Mallet}&{ {Frome,}Batts Combe Quarry is relatively small. The limestone produced is of a good quality. At one o'clock from Mon_Fri the explosions used to blast the limestone out can be heard. The limestone is graded and used for{Concrete & Tarmacadam}and also supplies the{Steel Industry.} A.R.C are conscious of the fact that Batts Combe is in the middle of some beautiful countryside.When a particular section is finished with, it is screened,that is landscaped and replanted to blend in. Not only does quarrying provide jobs & money for the area,it provides an important material used across the country.
